info.description: AWS AppSync provides API actions for creating and interacting with data sources using GraphQL from your application.
info.title: AWS AppSync

get.description: Lists the API keys for a given API.
Lists the data sources for a given API.
Retrieves the introspection schema for a GraphQL API.

post.description:
Adds a new schema to your GraphQL API.

This operation is asynchronous. Use to determine when it has completed.

get.description: Lists the types for a given API.
Lists the resolvers for a given API and type.

description.description: A description of the purpose of the API key.

expires.description: The time when the API key expires.

ApiKeyLimitExceededException.description: The API key exceeded a limit. Try your request again.

ApiLimitExceededException.description: The GraphQL API exceeded a limit. Try your request again.

BadRequestException.description: The request is not well formed. For example, a value is invalid or a required field is missing. Check the field values, and try again.

ConcurrentModificationException.description: Another modification is being made. That modification must complete before you can make your change.

description.description: A description of the purpose of the API key.

serviceRoleArn.description: The IAM service role ARN for the data source. The system assumes this role when accessing the data source.

authenticationType.description: The authentication type: API key, IAM, or Amazon Cognito User Pools.

userPoolConfig.description: The Amazon Cognito User Pool configuration.

dataSourceName.description: The name of the data source for which the resolver is being created.

fieldName.description: The name of the field to attach the resolver to.

requestMappingTemplate.description:
The mapping template to be used for requests.

A resolver use a request mapping template to convert a GraphQL expression into a format that a data source can understand. Mapping templates are written in Apache Velocity Template Language (VTL).

responseMappingTemplate.description: The mapping template to be used for responses from the data source.

definition.description:
The type definition, in GraphQL Schema Definition Language (SDL) format.

For more information, see the GraphQL SDL documentation.

format.description: The type format: SDL or JSON.

description.description: The description of the data source.

name.description: The name of the data source.

serviceRoleArn.description: The IAM service role ARN for the data source. The system assumes this role when accessing the data source.

type.description: The type of the data source.

DynamodbDataSourceConfig.description: Describes a DynamoDB data source configuration.

useCallerCredentials.description: Set to TRUE to use Amazon Cognito credentials with this data source.

ElasticsearchDataSourceConfig.description: Describes an Elasticsearch data source configuration.

schema.description:
The schema, in GraphQL Schema Definition Language (SDL) format.

For more information, see the GraphQL SDL documentation.

details.description: Detailed information about the status of the schema creation operation.

status.description: The current state of the schema (PROCESSING, ACTIVE, or DELETING). Once the schema is in the ACTIVE state, you can add data.

GraphQLSchemaException.description: The GraphQL schema is not valid.

userPoolConfig.description: The Amazon Cognito User Pool configuration.

InternalFailureException.description: An internal AWS AppSync error occurred. Try your request again.

LambdaDataSourceConfig.description: Describes a Lambda data source configuration.

lambdaFunctionArn.description: The ARN for the Lambda function.

LimitExceededException.description: The request exceeded a limit. Try your request again.

nextToken.description: An identifier to be passed in the next request to this operation to return the next set of items in the list.
An identifier to be passed in the next request to this operation to return the next set of items in the list.
An identifier to be passed in the next request to this operation to return the next set of items in the list.
An identifier to be passed in the next request to this operation to return the next set of items in the list.
An identifier to be passed in the next request to this operation to return the next set of items in the list.

NotFoundException.description: The resource specified in the request was not found. Check the resource and try again.

definition.description: The schema definition, in GraphQL schema language format.

status.description: The current state of the schema (PROCESSING, ACTIVE, or DELETING). Once the schema is in the ACTIVE state, you can add data.

format.description: The type format: SDL or JSON.

UnauthorizedException.description: You are not authorized to perform this operation.

description.description: The new description for the data source.

serviceRoleArn.description: The new service role ARN for the data source.

authenticationType.description: The new authentication type for the GraphqlApi object.

name.description: The new name for the GraphqlApi object.

userPoolConfig.description: The new Amazon Cognito User Pool configuration for the GraphqlApi object.

format.description: The new type format: SDL or JSON.

UserPoolConfig.description: Describes an Amazon Cognito User Pool configuration.

appIdClientRegex.description: A regular expression for validating the incoming Amazon Cognito User Pool app client ID.

awsRegion.description: The AWS region in which the user pool was created.

defaultAction.description: The action that you want your GraphQL API to take when a request that uses Amazon Cognito User Pool authentication doesn't match the Amazon Cognito User Pool configuration.
